name: Gaming Pad RHO
author: Jimor Marlow
notes:
One-handed (for right hand use only) keyboard with ortholinear orientation
Based on Zuoya GMK26 design with additions:
- Adding more keys
- Num minus (-) splited to separate buttons (R,F)
- Additional side encoder for right thumb
- Fn modifier key for VIA layouts switch
 
Version 0.1.0

Gaming Pad

One-handed (for right hand use only) keyboard with ortholinear orientation

Based on Zuoya GMK26 design with additions:

  • Adding more keys
  • Num minus (-) splited to separate buttons (R,F)
  • Additional side encoder for right thumb
  • Fn modifier key for VIA layouts switch

Version 0.1.0
